Uses of Interface
wordcram.WordAngler

Packages that use WordAngler
wordcram   
 

Uses of WordAngler in wordcram
 

Methods in wordcram that return WordAngler
static WordAngler Anglers.alwaysUse(float angle)
          If you want all your words to be drawn at the same angle, use this.
static WordAngler Anglers.hexes()
          A WordAngler that draws all words at hexagonal angles, or (if you're a bit more mathy) 0π/6, 1π/6, 2π/6, 3π/6, 4π/6, and 5π/6.
static WordAngler Anglers.horiz()
           
static WordAngler Anglers.mostlyHoriz()
           
static WordAngler Anglers.pickFrom(float... angles)
          Just like alwaysUse(float), but it takes multiple angles.
static WordAngler Anglers.random()
           
static WordAngler Anglers.upAndDown()
